data.event: The county was created in 1858 and later organized in 1878.
The county was created in 1858 and later organized in 1878.
1858 The Texas legislature establishes Taylor County from Bexar and Travis counties.
Butterfield Overland Mail establishes the Mountain Pass Station at Merkel, in continual use until 1861.
1880 Texas & Pacific Railroad signs an agreement to run tracks through the future city of Abilene.
1881 Abilene is established and named after Abilene, Kansas.
